function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High visitation rates to urban green spaces in Croatia and Slovenia","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to high foot traffic in urban green spaces","Mitigation":"Limiting the number of visitors, implementing social distancing measures, and promoting outdoor activities in less crowded areas","Technologies":"Crowd monitoring technology, mobile applications for visitor management, and social distancing apps","People":"Visitors to urban green spaces","Owner":"Local government, park management authorities"},{"Description":"Differences in travel distances to urban green spaces in different countries","Impact":"Varied travel distances may indicate different levels of exposure to potential disease transmission","Mitigation":"Educating visitors on safe travel practices, providing alternative transportation options, and promoting nearby green spaces","Technologies":"Geolocation apps, transportation tracking systems, and public transport infrastructure","People":"UGS visitors","Owner":"Local government, transportation authorities"},{"Description":"Variations in transportation methods to urban green spaces","Impact":"Differences in transportation methods may affect the risk of disease transmission and exposure","Mitigation":"Promoting sustainable transportation, providing bike-sharing programs, and improving pedestrian infrastructure","Technologies":"Transportation network apps, bike-sharing platforms, and pedestrian safety apps","People":"UGS visitors","Owner":"Local government, transportation authorities"}]}
